snippet: Justin Bieber, the 18-year-old pop sensation, was named a graduate of St. Michael Catholic Secondary School in Stratford, Ontario, at a ceremony on Thursday evening.
abstract: Justin Bieber, the 18-year-old pop sensation, was named a graduate of St. Michael Catholic Secondary School in Stratford, Ontario, at a ceremony on Thursday evening.

headline.main: Justin Bieber Graduates From High School
